instruction.en:
1.	Insert the AAA battery.
2.	Set the Z-Wave network main controller into learning mode.
3.	Press and hold the Z-button for 3 seconds to add the device in secure mode.
4.	If the inclusion is successful, the LED will blink less than 5 seconds and then keep on 3 seconds. Otherwise, the LED will blink 5 seconds and then turn off, in which case you need to repeat the process from step 2.

1.	Insert the battery.
2.	Set the Z-Wave network main controller into learning mode.
3.	Press and hold the Z-button for more than 3 seconds.
4.	If the exclusion is successful, the LED will blink less than 5 seconds and then keep on 3 seconds. Otherwise, the LED will blink 5 seconds and then turn off, in which case you need to repeat the process from step 2.
